channel.title: Can someone please help me out . . .(mpc to log-in)
channel.description:
i got moparclassic i have everything set up. the loginserver connects to the game server and all. i got my forums set with register and it saves the account you make to the forums database in users and it also stores it in the game database in the pk_players.
when i try to log into the client it tells me that i have a invalid username and password when i am using the right credentials. If anyone can help id appreciate it, as i have tried for some time now in between working and regular life stuff lol thanks in advance.

item.title: Can someone please help me out . . .(mpc to log-in)
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

I’ve never used mysql and would like to as someone else has talked me into trying it out.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone please help me out . . .(mpc to log-in)

item.title: Can someone please help me out . . .(mpc to log-in)
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

I did help you, no one is going to spoon feed you the information. If you can’t even fix this simple of a problem, revert back to NOOBscape.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone please help me out . . .(mpc to log-in)

item.title: Can someone please help me out . . .(mpc to log-in)
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

imthenull:

Instead of spamming everyone’s private message inbox, why don’t you try to debug the issue? See what username/password the server receives from the client, what does the login server receive from the game server? This issue isn’t hard to fix…

Lol spam?? i sent it to you only because i thought you would help me. . . obviously i need help

Read full topic
